Cryotek:
     He transformed back into Dragon mode and expertly dodged the blasts. Then he fired at the ground around Hyrda, it instantly froze, becoming slick as ice, and as brittle as thin glass.
 aerosmith60@... wrote:Hydras looked at the incoming freeze attack. His mouth opened and all the fire in his body seemed to come at it. It slowed the attack long enough to jump up and miss it.  His eyes powered up and shot lasers at the bot.
